text: The 2022–2023 Peruvian unrest is a series of demonstrations in Peru. They were called by the ousted president, Pedro Castillo. They began on 7 December 2022. Police shot demonstrators in Ayacucho and Juliaca. Category:2022 in South America Category:2022 protests Category:2023 in South America 2022 political protests Category:2020s in Peru Category:December 2022 events Category:January 2023 events
title: 2022–2023 Peruvian unrest
